recipesJson.name: Unicorn by Naked REMIX v.1
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is my remix on Naked's Unicorn, which is simply a strawberry and cream. It's an easy to mix, all CAPELLA recipe that relies on the flavor from CAP Strawberries & Cream.

More information and flavor notes here:
https://nolife.link/nakedunicorn

reviews.text: I have not ever had Unicorn or any Naked e-liquid for that matter. That being said, this is one of my favorite S&Cs. The Strawberry is so forward and the cream is a little lighter, much like a strawberry ice cream.  It's hard for me to imagine that the original commercial juice would be this good. Nice job...as always.
